description: An apron made of thick leather.  Cumbersome, but offers excellent protection from cuts.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A professional-looking wool blazer.  Quite cumbersome.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A long cotton dress.  Though comfortable to wear, it lacks any storage space.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A white button-down shirt with long sleeves.  Looks professional!  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A beautiful white wedding dress.  What good will it be now?  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A t-shirt embroidered with the pattern of an American flag.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A brightly-colored vest designed to keep you upright and floating in water.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A flotation vest made of inflated animal skins.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A luxurious evening gown.  It accentuates your curves, or lack thereof.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A short top made from cotton.  It is light and easy to wear.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A sweatshirt with a hood and a "kangaroo pocket" in the front for storage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A shirt made of thick material imprinted with the name and logo of a sports team.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation

A skin-tight spandex garment, covering the body from the groin to the shoulders.  With its deep scoop-cut back and high waist cuts, this garment is perfect for showcasing your physique on the stage.  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
A t-shirt with a picture of the Tux mascot on it.  Underneath it says "You wouldn't buy a car with the hood welded shut."  This can be worn regardless of your state of mutation
